attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: hi im harriet jones i am 14 years old and i am currently in care and living with a loving family who i have been with for just over a year. i would like evry ones help to get justice for baby.p evry time i see it on the news it is so hurtfull and painfull i mean why would you do that? i am asking for your help to get justise for this little helpless boy that had to pay with his life because the head of social sevecies cared more about there money than this little boy.What i am asking or is for you to get intouch with me i want action taking on the head of haringay social services as it is the second child to die in that area jue to failer of help from the social sevices.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
